Articles.Content: So I saw that Version 1.0 was out, and I went to the Launcher to update my game. However, when I opened the launcher, the box at the bottom that usually had the "Play" and "Update" buttons now just had "Checking for updates..." fading in and out. I seriously sat on that screen for about 30 minutes while I waited for it to give me the option to update, but it never did. Am I doing something wrong?
